title: LOOKING FOR PLAYERS TO DO MY PROVISIONALS WITH. WANT AT LEAST SILVER/GOLD...
body:
Hi. ING: BroFistCommander.
Add me.
I really would like to win my provisionals this year so I'd decided to make a post. 
I don't want to struggle carrying a game with new players ten times in a row so please help a guy out :)
I'm friendly and mature I have curse/skype.

Thanks for your time xD

replies.body: no offence but you sound like a scrub

You ended last season in bronze so from what I have heard (everyone dropping heaps of divisions, even after winning majority of placements games) you are going to have to win almost all of your games to reach silver. Otherwise you can always climb after you get placed :D

Yes, I was placed b5 after 6 losses and 4 wins.

Last season, I wasn't sure how solo queue would turn out. To my horror I was thrown into a group of new players who just hit level 30.
Most games were a struggle and the four games I did win was due to the same situation happening on the enemy team which allowed to feed enough to carry the other 4 players on my team. I even won a game back dooring with Soraka. xD

This actually put me off from playing ranked games.
